FM MOTEGI held a press conference. He took questions on Japan’s future diplomacy toward the U.S., Japan-China relations (related to rare earths), Japan’s diplomacy toward Israel.
He also addressed questions on U.S. remarks on acquiring Greenland, the outcomes of Foreign Minister

［FM MOTEGI's Visit to #Qatar and the #Philippines]
-Message from Qatar –

I am currently in Doha, the capital of Qatar.
You may think that it would be very hot in the Middle East, but as it is winter now, the daytime temperature is in the low-20s, and it is quite comfortable.
I https://t.co/QtbXnHHTrK

FM MOTEGI offered flowers at Raj Ghat, the site where Mahatma Gandhi, the father of Indian independence, was cremated, during his visit to Delhi, #India.

We have recently confirmed that #China has initiated an installation of a new structure on the west side of the geographical equidistance line between Japan and China in the East China Sea.
It is extremely regrettable that China is advancing unilateral development in the East
